Dear {evaluator_name}


We would like to invite you to participate as an evaluator in the 360¬∞ Performance Evaluation.


Your honest and constructive feedback is highly valued and will contribute significantly to their professional development. The evaluation will assess key competencies including collaboration, performance, communication, and leadership.

Evaluation Details

  • Evaluation Link: {survey_url}
  • Submission Deadline: {due_date}
  • Estimated Completion Time: 5 minutes
  • Confidentiality: All individual responses will remain confidential and used solely for development purposes.

If you have already completed this evaluation, please disregard this message. Should you have any questions or require assistance, feel free to contact us at any time.


Thank you in advance for your time and valuable input.


Best regards,

Pasona Thailand
